pv36:1.2: ambasakkaro → ambasakkharo (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2); appasakkaro (mr)
pv36:12.1: Addhā paṭiññā me tadā ahu → paṭiññātametaṃ tadāhu (mr); paṭiññā na mete tadā ahu (?)
pv36:14.5: Sabbampi akkhissaṃ → sabbaṃ ācikkhissaṃ (bj); sabbaṃ akkhissaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2)
pv36:16.1: Vesāliyā nagarassa → tassa nagarassa (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2)
pv36:37.3: majja → samajja (bj, pts-vp-pli1-2); sa majja (sya1ed, sya2ed)
pv36:46.3: bhijjanti ca te → bhijjanti tava (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
pv36:51.2: Tappaccayā vāpi → tappaccayā tāhaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli2); tappaccayā cāhaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
pv36:59.3: neva maṃ lacchasi → teneva maṃ na lacchasi (bj); teneva maṃ licchavi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); teneva maṃ na lacchasi (pts-vp-pli2); teneva maṃ lacchasi (mr)
pv36:66.4: Paṇihitadaṇḍo → paṇītadaṇḍo (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2, mr) | anusattarūpo → anupakkarūpo (mr)
pv36:63.2: Teneva saha → tena samaṃ (bj); tena saha (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
pv36:77.5: Imañca ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgavarenupetaṃ → imañca aṭṭhaṅgavaraṃ upetaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
pv36:78.6: vippasannena cetasā → sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
pv36:80.3: Muñca tuvaṃ → mucceyya so tvaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli2, mr); mucceyya so (sya1ed, sya2ed); muñca so tvaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
pv36:84.3: vikampāmi → vikappāmi (bj, pts-vp-pli2); vikkappāmi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
